title: 2213 Three Seater Sofa Italian Leather/Black
body: Borge Mogensen designed the 2213 Three Seater Sofa in 1962 for their house in Gentofte, north of Copenhagen together with his wife Alice. This sofa features a clean lines and simple look, a characteristic that emanates in most of Borge Mogensen's designs. Up to this day, this sofa is still widely used in government buildings, embassies, executive offices and private homes the world over. With the 2213 Three Seater Sofa, you can add a distinct accent to your home with its clean lines and clear functionality.
